purpose: The email announces a 2-year postdoctoral researcher position at the University of Southern Denmark in the Software Engineering section of the Maersk Mc-Kinney Moller Institute. The successful candidate will work on the Nudge2Green research project, focusing on developing AI-driven digital nudging tools to promote sustainable food choices. The position requires a PhD in a relevant field and offers a collaborative research environment with opportunities for professional development. The application deadline is set for June 10, 2025.
